sources.title: The Underdog (1943) Barton MacLane, Bobby Larson, Jan Wiley | Drama, War
sources.description:
COURAGE PROVED BY FIRE... Even a Quitter Can Be A Hero When The Chips Are Down!  During WWII, a small but strong-willed 12-year-old boy tries to steer his vocationally and maritally confused father straight, at the same time striving to keep his honor while the gang in his new neighborhood bully him. 

Director: William Nigh
Writers: Ben Lithman, Lawrence Taylor
Stars: Barton MacLane, Bobby Larson, Jan Wiley 
Genres: Classics, Drama, War 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: During WWII, a small but strong-willed 12-year-old boy tries to steer his vocationally and maritally confused father straight, at the same time striving to keep his honor while the gang in his new neighborhood bully him. Nazi sympathizers connive to set up his father in a sabotage scheme.
metadata.Writer: Ben Lithman, Lawrence Taylor, Malvin Wald
metadata.Actors: Barton MacLane, Bobby Larson, Jan Wiley
